fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Thunderbolt: Zap a player with a Basic attack. Whenever you use this, your attack tier increases. (3 uses)
- Electroball: Roleblock a player AND whoever visits them. (3 uses)
- Thunder Wave: Redirect two players to each other. (1 use)
- Evolve: Evolve into **Raichu** (2303). May only be used if your attack tier is raised to **Unstoppable**.
- Regional Evolve: Evolve into **Alolan Raichu** (2302). May only be used if you completed one of the following conditions as **Pichu**: Used Play Nice on someone that tried attacking OR used Nasty Plot on a Pokemember who wouldn't have killed a target if ya didnâ€™t help.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Agility: You're capable of multitasking as long as you have enough uses.
